item.title: Bandai Namco announces Summer Showcase for July 2nd
item.content:encoded:
If you thought showcase season was over it turns out you’re wrong. Bandai Namco has confirmed that it will be holding a Summer Showcase on July 2nd at 12pm PT / 3pm ET / 8pm BST/ 9pm CEST / 4am JST. The company has already confirmed one of the announcements from the showcase with a new My Hero Academia game to be shown during it. Other than that the publisher has stated that there will be new trailers.

While the new My Hero Academia game seems to be the focus, with the showcase including a gameplay deep dive, Bandai Namco has confirmed that other games will be present too. These include Code Vein II, Little Nightmares III, The Blood of Dawnwalker, Everybody’s Golf Hot Shots, Shadow Labyrinth, Death Note Killer Within, Super Robot Wars Y,  Patapon 1 & 2 Replay, and Tekken 8. Bandai Namco has not said how long the showcase will run for.

Source: YouTube
